{{infobox character | people-duplicated=[[Easterlings (First Age)|Easterling]] | name=Borlach | image=Helena Stepanova - Bor with his sons.jpg | people=[[Easterlings (First Age)|Easterling (First Age)]] | caption="Bor with his sons" by [[:Category:Images by Helena Stepanova|Helena Stepanova]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[East Beleriand]] | affiliation=[[Union of Maedhros]] | language= | birth=[[First Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{FA|472}} | deathlocation=[[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]] | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage=[[Bór]] | siblings=[[Borlad]] and [[Borthand]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Borlach''' was one of the sons of [[Bór]]. == History == Borlach and his kin entered the service of [[Maedhros]] and [[Maglor]], the eldest [[Sons of Fëanor]].{{S|18}} He fought in the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]], and was faithful to the [[Noldor]], taking part in the slaying of [[Ulfang]]'s sons before he was himself slain.{{S|20}} == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | | | BOR | | | | | |BOR=[[Bór]]

''d. {{FA|472}}''}} {{familytree/end}} == Etymology == The exact meaning is unclear, but is tied to the root BOR- ("loyalty"){{LR|Etymologies}}, root BOR- adding the word ''[[lach]]'' ("flame"). == Other versions of the legendarium == In the [[The Later Annals of Beleriand|''Later Annals of Beleriand'']] and the ''[[Grey Annals]]'', the name of the character was ''Boromir'',{{WJ|15}}, p. 134., ([Annal] 263){{WJ|P1}}, pp. 61 (§174), 64 ("Conclusion of annal 463 in Version II"), 128 (note to §174), a name later used for [[Boromir (Lord of Ladros)|Boromir of Ladros]].{{LR|AB}}, p. 151 (note to Annal 263){{WJ|15}}, p. 240 The Boromir referred to in the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] (cf. [[Boromir (Lord of Ladros)#Etymology|Boromir of Ladros: Etymology]]) is thus Borlach.{{LR|Index}}, p. 420 (compare references for "Boromir (1)" and "Boromir (2)"){{webcite|author=[[Anders Stenström]]|articleurl=https://tolkienlistsearch.herokuapp.com/message/5e9c35d76beb162366dc0280|articlename=Re: Boromir name being Quenya or Sindarin (163.58)|dated=2022-06-20|website=[[Elfling]]|accessed=2022-09-23}} In the appendix of ''[[The Lost Road]]'' it states that Borlach (then called Boromir) was born in the year 145.{{LR|A1}} {{references}} [[Category:Characters in The Silmarillion]] [[Category:Easterlings (First Age)]] [[Category:First Age characters]] [[Category:Sindarin names]] [[de:Borlach]] [[fi:Borlach]] [[fr:encyclo:personnages:hommes:1a:orientaux:borlach]]
